block.securitycraft.laser.name: 雷射
block.securitycraft.reinforced_orange_st: 強化橙色染色玻璃窗格
block.securitycraft.reinforced_magenta_s: 強化洋紅色染色玻璃窗格
block.securitycraft.reinforced_light_blu: 強化淺藍色染色玻璃窗格
block.securitycraft.reinforced_yellow_st: 強化黃色染色玻璃窗格
block.securitycraft.reinforced_lime_stai: 強化石頭灰染色玻璃窗格
block.securitycraft.reinforced_pink_stai: 強化粉色染色玻璃窗格
block.securitycraft.reinforced_gray_stai: 強化灰色染色玻璃窗格
block.securitycraft.reinforced_light_gra: 強化淺灰色染色玻璃窗格
block.securitycraft.reinforced_cyan_stai: 強化青色染色玻璃窗格
block.securitycraft.reinforced_purple_st: 強化紫色染色玻璃窗格
block.securitycraft.reinforced_blue_stai: 強化藍色染色玻璃窗格
block.securitycraft.reinforced_brown_sta: 強化棕色染色玻璃窗格
block.securitycraft.reinforced_green_sta: 強化綠色染色玻璃窗格
block.securitycraft.reinforced_black_sta: 強化黑色染色玻璃窗格
block.securitycraft.reinforced_smooth_re: 強化平滑的紅砂岩階梯
強化平滑的紅砂岩半磚
block.securitycraft.reinforced_polished_: 強化拋光安山岩石半磚
death.attack.securitycraft.laser.player: %1$s在與%2$s戰鬥時被雷射切割致死
death.attack.securitycraft.fakeWater.pla: %1$s在與%2$s戰鬥時掉入有毒的水中...？
help.securitycraft.laser_block.info: The laser block is used by putting two of them within five blocks of each other. When the blocks are placed correctly, a laser should form between them.
help.securitycraft.keypad.info: 密碼鎖方塊用於放置密碼鎖的方塊、右擊密碼鎖方塊和設定數位密碼。設定密碼鎖方塊後，右鍵點擊密碼鎖方塊將允許您輸入密碼。如果正確，密碼鎖方塊將發出三秒鐘的紅石電源。
help.securitycraft.mine.info: 地雷在被苦力怕、貓和豹貓以外的任何實體踩踏時爆炸。拿著線切割機可解除，並允許您將其打破。用打火石將它重新啟用。
help.securitycraft.dirt_mine.info: 泥土地雷是標準地雷。走進它或挖掘它會導致它爆炸。將本配方中的泥土替換為鵝卵石、鑽石礦、熔爐、礫石、砂或石頭...以獲得這些變體。
help.securitycraft.furnace_mine.info: 熔爐地雷就像泥土地雷一樣，只是它只有在你正確使用它的時候才會爆炸。
help.securitycraft.retinal_scanner.info: 擁有者在範圍內看著它來發出15格紅石信號。
help.securitycraft.keycard_reader.info: 如果插入安全級別等於或高於（GUI中指定的）的密鑰卡，則鑰匙卡讀卡器會發出15格紅石信號。(右鍵點擊它以開啟GUI)
help.securitycraft.reinforced_iron_trapd: 強化鐵陷阱門與原版陷阱門相同，但只能由密碼鎖方塊、安全檢測器等打開，且只能由放下它的人打開。
help.securitycraft.bouncing_betty.info: 彈跳貝蒂將接收訊號時發射到空中隨即爆炸。觸碰時也會爆炸。
help.securitycraft.inventory_scanner.inf: 將兩個安全檢測器朝向對方擺放。正確放置時，雷射場應在它們之間生成。點擊掃描器可察看違禁品。當玩家走激光時所有違禁品將被沒收，或者將根據掃描器的設定發出紅石訊號。
help.securitycraft.track_mine.info: 當一輛礦車經過礦井頂部時，軌道地雷就會爆炸。
help.securitycraft.cage_trap.info: 籠子陷阱將產生一個'籠子'周圍的任何玩家觸摸它就會觸發陷阱。(擁有者除外)
help.securitycraft.portable_radar.info: 每當玩家在雷達的探測半徑內時，便攜式雷達會向擁有者發送聊天消息。您可以用命名牌右擊便攜式雷達來命名它。
help.securitycraft.keypad_chest.info: 受密碼保護的箱子配有密碼鎖定系統。輸入正確密碼箱子就會打開。
help.securitycraft.username_logger.info: 當使用者名字記錄器由紅石供電時，它將在3個區塊內記錄任何玩家的姓名。
help.securitycraft:reinforced.info: 被強化方塊是牢不可破的方塊。只有放下它們的人才能使用通用的去除器摧毀它們。
help.securitycraft.alarm.info: 每當由紅石供電時，警報器都會發出警笛聲效果，並閃爍紅色，之後每隔2秒。
help.securitycraft.reinforced_fence_gate: 強化鐵柵欄門與原版柵欄門相同，只是牢不可破，只能通過密碼鎖方塊、安全檢測器等打開。它會傷害接觸它的任何人，擁有者除外。
help.securitycraft.panic_button.info: 緊急按鈕看起來像一個按鈕，但工作方式與控制桿相同。
help.securitycraft.keypad_frame.info: 該密碼鎖框架用於製作密碼鎖方塊。用密碼鎖右鍵點擊它，以製作密碼鎖方塊。
help.securitycraft.claymore.info: 暴徒或玩家走在闊刀地雷面向前方的5個方塊內經過1秒鐘後會爆炸。線切割機可拆除地雷。用打火石能將它重新啟用。
help.securitycraft.keypad_furnace.info: 受密碼保護的熔爐將要求您在第一次放下時輸入密碼。之後，在GUI中輸入正確的密碼將允許您訪問熔爐的背包。
help.securitycraft.security_camera.info: 監視器允許您監控附近區域。只需放下監視器，然後用監視器控制台將監視器右擊來將其綁定以供使用。
help.securitycraft.reinforced_glass_pane: 強化玻璃窗格與原版玻璃相同，但只有放下玻璃的人才能使用通用去除器將其破壞。
強化與原版鐵棒相同，但只有放下鐵條的人才能使用通用去除器將其摧毀。
help.securitycraft.electrified_iron_fenc: 強化鐵柵欄的作用與原版柵欄相同，只是牢不可破，當主人與它接觸時，會傷害除主人以外的任何人。
help.securitycraft.ims.info: I.M.S.或稱智慧彈藥系統，是一種可補充的地雷，可容納多達4個彈跳貝蒂，將自動瞄準進入其射擊半徑的玩家及暴徒。一旦地雷發射，它將跟蹤實體並爆炸。如果I.M.S.缺少地雷，可使用彈跳貝蒂來補充地雷。
help.securitycraft.protecto.info: 在下雨或下雪時，每隔10秒就會用雷電攻擊半徑範圍10格內的任何生物。
help.securitycraft.motion_activated_ligh: 當玩家在感應燈的一定範圍內（可配置）會發出燈光。
help.securitycraft.trophy_system.info: 攔截雷達偵測到敵人的箭和火球半秒之後會摧毀它們。
help.securitycraft.crystal_quartz.info: 水晶石英塊是積木，可以以通常的方式強化，並類似於原版石英塊。
help.securitycraft.reinforced_crystal_qu: 強化水晶石英塊用於構建防禦空間。防禦空間管理器頁面上的更多資訊。
help.securitycraft.block_pocket_wall.inf: 防禦空間玻璃用於構建防禦空間。防禦空間管理器頁面上可獲得更多資訊。
防禦空間管理器用於管理防禦空間，這是一個空間，只有它的主人和白名單的玩家可以進入。打開GUI時，您會看到各種尺寸。選擇一個，然後圍繞管理器構建防禦空間。請確保將管理器放在底層的外部。防禦空間是您選擇的大小的立方體。角落用強化鑿水晶石英建造，兩角之間的方塊用正確導向的強化水晶石英柱建造，地板/牆壁/天花板用防禦空間玻璃建造。構建結構後單擊'啟動'將啟動任何添加的模組。有關更多資訊，請參閱自訂GUI（使用通用方塊修改器右擊）。
help.securitycraft.reinforced_stone_pres: 增強壓力板只能由其擁有者或白名單玩家啟動。
help.securitycraft.reinforced_stone_butt: 增強按鈕只能由其擁有者或白名單玩家啟動。
help.securitycraft.reinforced_lever.info: 強化控制桿只能由其擁有者或白名單玩家啟動。
help.securitycraft.reinforced_hopper.inf: 強化漏斗是唯一可用於從受密碼保護的箱子中提取物品的漏斗，必須兩者都歸同一玩家所有。否則它就會像原版漏斗一樣。
help.securitycraft.projector.info: 虛擬投影機將您選擇的方塊虛擬投影到世界中，可用於隱藏建築物...。投影範圍和寬度可在投影機的GUI內更改。
help.securitycraft.codebreaker.info: 破碼器可以通過右鍵點擊'密碼鎖方塊'、'密碼保護的箱子'、'密碼保護的熔爐'來破解。（3次使用機會2/3的機率能成功破解）
help.securitycraft.door_indestructible_i: 強化鐵門和原版鐵門一樣，除了牢不可破。它只能通過密碼鎖方塊、安全檢測器等打開。門的主人可以使用通用的去除器將其破壞。
help.securitycraft.scanner_door_item.inf: 掃描器門就像視網膜掃描器，結合了增強鐵門，主人看著它打開門。
help.securitycraft.universal_block_remov: 通用方塊去除器用於通過右擊來破壞堅硬的強化方塊。(只能破壞自己的方塊)
help.securitycraft.keycard_lv1.info: 鑰匙卡與鑰匙卡讀取器一起使用。有六張鑰匙卡，1級、2級、3級、4級和5級卡，以及相當於5級卡的有限使用卡，在生存模式下只能使用5次。
help.securitycraft.keycard_lv2.info: 鑰匙卡與鑰匙卡讀取器一起使用。有六張鑰匙卡，1級、2級、3級、4級和5級卡，以及相當於5級卡的有限使用卡，在生存模式下只能使用5次。
help.securitycraft.keycard_lv3.info: 鑰匙卡與鑰匙卡讀取器一起使用。有六張鑰匙卡，1級、2級、3級、4級和5級卡，以及相當於5級卡的有限使用卡，在生存模式下只能使用5次。
help.securitycraft.keycard_lv4.info: 鑰匙卡與鑰匙卡讀取器一起使用。有六張鑰匙卡，1級、2級、3級、4級和5級卡，以及相當於5級卡的有限使用卡，在生存模式下只能使用5次。
help.securitycraft.keycard_lv5.info: 鑰匙卡與鑰匙卡讀取器一起使用。有六張鑰匙卡，1級、2級、3級、4級和5級卡，以及相當於5級卡的有限使用卡，在生存模式下只能使用5次。
help.securitycraft.limited_use_keycard.i: 鑰匙卡與鑰匙卡讀取器一起使用。有六張鑰匙卡，1級、2級、3級、4級和5級卡，以及相當於5級卡的有限使用卡，在生存模式下只能使用5次。
help.securitycraft.remote_access_mine.in: 地雷遠端訪問工具將允許您遠端訪問地雷。右擊地雷，將其'綁定'到工具上。在空中右擊（配備工具）以打開工具的GUI，這將允許您啟動、停用、引爆或解開任何綁定地雷。
哨兵遠端訪問工具將允許您遠端控制哨兵。右擊哨兵將其「綁定」到工具上。在空中右擊（配備工具）打開工具的GUI，這將允許您改變每個綁定哨兵，或同時更改哨兵的模式。
help.securitycraft.bucket_f_water.info: 假水如同岩漿具有傷害性
help.securitycraft.bucket_f_lava.info: 假岩漿桶能立即治癒你，而不是傷害你。
help.securitycraft.universal_block_modif: 通用方塊修改器用於更改自訂安全工藝的各種塊。右擊方塊以打開自訂GUI。然後，您可以插入「模組」來自訂該方塊的功能。
help.securitycraft.redstone_module.info: 紅石模組將電源屬性添加到方塊中。
help.securitycraft.whitelist_module.info: 白名單模組通常會從方塊的效果或密碼檢查中略過玩家。
help.securitycraft.blacklist_module.info: 黑名單模組通常將玩家添加到方塊的效果中，或阻止它們使用方塊的某個功能。
help.securitycraft.harming_module.info: 傷害模組為塊添加損壞屬性。
help.securitycraft.smart_module.info: 智慧模組可升級方塊的範圍或功能。
help.securitycraft.storage_module.info: 儲存模組可添加或升級方塊背包的空間。
help.securitycraft.disguise_module.info: 偽裝模組在添加到某些塊時會偽裝它們。
help.securitycraft.wire_cutters.info: 用線切割機能拆解炸彈
help.securitycraft.keypad_item.info: 密碼鎖用於製作密碼鎖方塊、密碼保護箱和密碼保護的熔爐的配方。
help.securitycraft.admin_tool.info: 管理工具的主要目的是顯示有關安全工藝方塊的資訊。它將顯示所有者的UUID和名稱以及其他資訊，如密碼和任何插入的模組。(限管理員使用)
help.securitycraft.camera_monitor.info: 監視器控制台是用於查看多達30台已綁定監視器的便攜式物品。拿著監視器控制台右擊監視器以將其綁定，右鍵單擊空氣可進入控制台GUI。
help.securitycraft.sc_manual.info: 安全工藝手冊顯示有關安全工藝添加的所有塊和專案的基本資訊。有關更深入的描述，請google查看SecurityCraft的WIKI
help.securitycraft.universal_owner_chang: 通用擁有者更改器可以更改方塊的擁有者。要做到這一點，請將使用鐵砧重命名為新擁有者的名稱。然後點擊你要變更的方塊。
help.securitycraft.universal_block_reinf: 通用方塊強化器強化了許多原版塊，並把它們變成安全工藝方塊。要做到這一點，請右鍵單擊通用方塊強化器，將原版塊放入頂部插槽，然後關閉GUI。要將強化方塊轉換回原版方塊，請使用底部插槽。Lv1能強化300個方塊。幾乎所有原版方塊都可強化。
通用方塊強化器強化了許多原版塊，並把它們變成安全工藝方塊。要做到這一點，請右鍵單擊通用方塊強化器，將原版塊放入頂部插槽，然後關閉GUI。要將強化方塊轉換回原版方塊，請使用底部插槽。Lv2能強化2700個方塊。幾乎所有原版方塊都可強化。
通用方塊強化器強化了許多原版塊，並把它們變成安全工藝方塊。要做到這一點，請右鍵單擊通用方塊強化器，將原版塊放入頂部插槽，然後關閉GUI。要將強化方塊轉換回原版方塊，請使用底部插槽。Lv3能強化無限個方塊。幾乎所有原版方塊都可強化。
help.securitycraft.briefcase.info: 公事包是一個密碼鎖鎖定的便攜式儲存單元，包含12個插槽。要刪除公事包的密碼或更改其擁有者，請將公事包拿在左手，同時右手拿著鑰匙轉換器/通用擁有者更改器右擊來變更。
help.securitycraft.universal_key_changer: 通用鑰匙轉換器允許您更改您擁有的受密碼保護方塊的密碼。右鍵擊受密碼保護的方塊以打開GUI，然後鍵入您想要的新密碼。
help.securitycraft.secret_sign_item.info: 秘密告示牌的工作原理就像一個原版告示牌，但只有告示牌的主人和白名單的玩家查看文字。並確保沒有人可以打破它！
help.securitycraft.sentry.info: 哨兵有三種模式，可以通過右擊來切換。和平（它永遠不會攻擊），偽裝（偵測到敵人時才會探頭攻擊），侵略性（它會時刻保持備戰狀態）。用包含完整和不透明塊（如石頭，但不是玻璃或階梯）的偽裝模組正確點擊它將使哨兵偽裝自己。偽裝模組可以直接切換，也可以通過使用通用方塊修改器右擊提取。要清除哨兵，請SHIFT+右擊。
help.securitycraft.crystal_quartz_item.i: 水晶石英用於製作水晶石英塊。
help.securitycraft.keypad_door_item.info: 密碼鎖門就像密碼鎖方塊與增強鐵門相結合，必須輸入密碼才能打開門。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.intro.2: by Geforce, bl4ckscor3, Redstone_Dubstep, and ChainmailPickaxe
gui.securitycraft:scManual.ownableBlock: 可擁有：此方塊具有抗爆炸性，只能由將其放下的玩家使用'通用方塊去除器'打破。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.passwordProte: 受密碼保護：只有正確輸入所有者設定的密碼，才能使用此方塊。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.viewActivated: 已啟動檢視：此方塊可以看著她來激活。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.explosiveBloc: 爆炸性：此方塊能夠遠端引爆，並且可以使用地雷遠端訪問工具啟動/停用。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.customizableB: 可自訂：您可以使用通用方塊修改器和安全工藝添加的各種模組來自訂此方塊的功能。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.keypad: 放下一個密碼鎖框架，用密碼鎖右鍵點擊它。
放下一個箱子，用密碼鎖右擊它。
放下一個熔爐，用鑰匙卡右擊它。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.reinfo: 拿通用方塊強化器右擊打開GUI，丟入原版方塊，退出GUI後即強化成功。
任意強化方塊均可透過如下方式合成：放置一個對應的普通的原版方塊（比如強化石頭->石頭），然後使用通用方塊強化器左擊它，亦或是在使用通用方塊破壞器右擊時，在GUI格子中放置對應方塊即可。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.admin_: 管理員工具僅通過創意背包提供，前提是它通過配置檔啟用。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.reinfo: 由通用方塊強化器中的一般水晶石英塊製成。
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.sc_man: 安全工藝手冊僅通過創意背包或鍵入'/sc help'
gui.securitycraft:invScan.emit_redstone: 在找到以上物品時發射紅石訊號：%s
gui.securitycraft:protectedFurnace.name: 受保護的熔爐
gui.securitycraft:srat.name: 哨兵遠端訪問工具

gui.securitycraft:blockPocketManager.nee: 需要一個儲存模組來實現防禦空間的自動組裝。
messages.securitycraft:bugReport: 請在我們的不和諧伺服器上的#bugreport頻道中報告錯誤。請先閱讀規則
messages.securitycraft:securityCamera.mo: 您現在已連線到監視器上。使用 %1$s%2$s%3$s%4$s 來移動，以及放大和縮小的 %5$s/%6$s 按鈕。
messages.securitycraft:retinalScanner.no: 很抱歉，您不能使用此掃描器。它由%s擁有。
messages.securitycraft:portableRadar.wit: %1$s位於您的便攜式雷達附近，名為%2$s。

messages.securitycraft:codebreakerDisabl: 密碼斷路器已通過配置檔被停用。
messages.securitycraft:keycardReader.req: 所需的安全等級:%1$s-您的鑰匙卡級別:%2$s
messages.securitycraft:invScan.notConnec: 這未連接到另一個安全檢測器塊！
messages.securitycraft:module.notHolding: 您必須持有要儲存資料的模組。
messages.securitycraft:module.alreadyCon: 您持有的模組已經包含播放機#。
messages.securitycraft:module.added: 將#添加到已舉行的模組。
messages.securitycraft:module.notHolding: 您必須持有要修改的模組！
messages.securitycraft:notOwned: 對不起，你不能這樣做。它由%s擁有。
messages.securitycraft:adminTool.noInfo: 此方塊沒有要顯示的資訊！
messages.securitycraft:adminTool.needCre: 您需要處於創造模式才能使用管理工具。
messages.securitycraft:reinforcedSlab.ca: 你必須是這個方塊的主人，把它變成一個雙板。
messages.securitycraft:cameraMonitor.can: 無法查看不屬於自己的監視器控制台。
messages.securitycraft:cameraMonitor.unb: 已取消綁定位於%s的監視器。
messages.securitycraft:mrat.noSlots: 有沒有更多的空插槽綁定這個地雷！
messages.securitycraft:mrat.cantBind: 你不能綁定一個不屬於你的礦。
messages.securitycraft:mrat.bound: 遠程存取工具已經綁定位於 %s 地雷
messages.securitycraft:srat.noSlots: 沒有更多的空插槽綁定這個哨兵！
messages.securitycraft:srat.cantBind: 你不能約束一個不屬於你的哨兵。
messages.securitycraft:srat.bound: 已將%s的哨兵連結到遠端訪問工具。
messages.securitycraft:universalOwnerCha: 您需要使用鐵砧重新命名成新擁有者的名稱。
此方塊無法容納擁有者。請正確點擊適當的安全工藝方塊。
這不是你的方塊，你不能改變它的主人。
非擁有者，您無法申請方塊。
這不是你的公事包，你不能改變它的主人。
messages.securitycraft:irc.connected: 截至安全世界的v1.8.3，IRC聊天不再支援。如果您需要説明，請參閱安全工藝的「不和諧」上的#help頻道！
messages.securitycraft:frame.rightclick: 右擊一個綁定的監視器進行查看。
messages.securitycraft:command.sc.usage: 使用：/sc連接或/sc斷開連接或/sc聯繫或/sc簡歷
messages.securitycraft:tip.scHelp: 鍵入/sc説明將為您提供安全工藝手冊的配方，該手冊將顯示安全克拉夫特塊/專案的幫助資訊。
messages.securitycraft:tip.patreon: 如果你喜歡安全工藝，請考慮支持我們在派特雷恩！您可以與我們合作，在mod中獲取您選擇的功能。
messages.securitycraft:tip.discord: 有一個建議的模組或發現一個錯誤？加入我們的不和諧伺服器（僅限英語）！您還將收到有關安全程式的重要更新和公告。
messages.securitycraft:tip.outdated: 您的安全世界版本已過時！考慮更新以提供更多的功能和更少的錯誤。
messages.securitycraft:tip.scserver: 官方安全工藝伺服器回來了！使用此IP加入：securitycraft.nodecraft.gg
messages.securitycraft:universalKeyChang: 右鍵與通用鑰匙更換器一起點擊密碼鎖方塊以更改其密碼。
此公事包的密碼已重置。
這個公事包沒有密碼，不能重置。
這不是你的公事包，你不能改變它的密碼。
messages.securitycraft:passwordProtected: 此方塊尚未有密碼。您無法與它互動。
messages.securitycraft:sentry.needsBlock: 你必須把哨兵放在一個方塊的上面！
確保你的哨兵四面都圍著方塊！
messages.securitycraft:sentry.descriptio: （始終活躍，攻擊敵對的暴徒和玩家）
（當敵對的暴徒或玩家靠近時啟動，攻擊敵對的暴徒和玩家）
（當敵對暴徒靠近時啟動，攻擊敵對暴徒）
（當玩家靠近時啟動，攻擊玩家）
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.multi: 結構中有多個防禦空間管理器。
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.alrea: 防禦空間已經組裝好了！
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.inval: 支柱%1$s防禦空間管理器旋轉不正確！
無效區塊"%2$s"%1$s防禦空間管理器！（預期:"%3$s"）
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.block: "%2$s"正在阻止空間%1$s防禦空間管理器！
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.unown: 您不擁有方塊"%2$s"%1$s防禦空間管理器！
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.notEn: 你沒有足夠的項目來組裝這種大小的防禦空間！
您可以添加$1%塊和$2%的專案。
module.securitycraft.ims.whitelist_modul: 在I.M.S.中添加白名單模組將允許白名單玩家在不成為目標的情況下進入I.M.S.的範圍。
module.securitycraft.inventory_scanner.w: 在安全檢測器中加入白名單模組將允許白名單玩家無需檢查背包即可通過檢測器。
module.securitycraft.inventory_scanner.s: 在安全檢測器中加入智慧模組將使掃描器在掃描背包時檢查附魔和其他詮釋資料的變更。
加入儲存模組將允許掃描器沒收違禁物品。
module.securitycraft.inventory_scanner.d: 在安全檢測器中加入偽裝模組將導致其材質和型號變更為偽裝模組設定的方塊。
module.securitycraft.inventory_scanner.r: 將紅石模組加入到安全檢測器中將使其在發現違禁品時發出紅石訊號。
module.securitycraft.keycard_reader.whit: 向鑰匙卡讀卡機添加白名單模組將允許玩家使用任何密鑰卡使用讀卡機。
module.securitycraft.keycard_reader.blac: 在鑰匙卡讀卡機中添加黑名單模組將禁止玩家使用讀卡機
module.securitycraft.keycard_reader.disg: 將偽裝模組添加到鑰匙卡讀卡器將偽裝成其他方塊
module.securitycraft.keypad.whitelist_mo: 在密碼鎖方塊上添加白名單模組將允許玩家在不知道密碼的情況下使用該方塊。
module.securitycraft.keypad.blacklist_mo: 在密碼鎖方塊上添加黑名單模組將禁止玩家使用方塊。
module.securitycraft.keypad.disguise_mod: 將偽裝模組添加到密碼鎖方塊將偽裝成其他方塊
module.securitycraft.laser_block.harming: 將傷害模組添加到雷射塊中會導致玩家在穿過雷射時受到傷害。
module.securitycraft.laser_block.whiteli: 在雷射塊中添加白名單模組將允許玩家在不發出紅石訊號的情況下穿過雷射。
module.securitycraft.laser_block.disguis: 將偽裝模組添加到雷射塊將偽裝成其他方塊
module.securitycraft.portable_radar.reds: 在便攜式雷達中添加紅石模組將導致雷達在玩家處於射程內時發出紅石信號。
module.securitycraft.portable_radar.whit: 在便攜式雷達中添加白名單模組將使白名單玩家從雷達搜尋中刪除。
module.securitycraft.retinal_scanner.whi: 將白名單模組添加到視網膜掃描器將允許玩家使用掃描器，即使他們不是放置方塊的玩家。
module.securitycraft.retinal_scanner.dis: 在視網膜掃描器中添加偽裝模組將導致其材質和型號更改為偽裝模組設定的方塊。
module.securitycraft.security_camera.red: 將紅石模組添加到監視器中，可讓監視器在啟用時發出15格紅石信號。
module.securitycraft.security_camera.sma: 將智慧模組添加到監視器控制台中，任何人都可以訪問監視器。
module.securitycraft.protecto.whitelist_: 在雷擊保護石中添加白名單模組將允許白名單玩家進入保護範圍。
module.securitycraft.block_pocket_manage: 在防禦空間管理器中添加偽裝模組將使防禦空間玻璃變不透明
將白名單模組添加到防禦空間管理器將允許白名單玩家通過防禦空間。
將儲存模組添加到防禦空間管理器中將添加背包，允許您儲存構建防禦空間所需的塊。如果存在所有必要的建築材料，這也允許您自動組裝防禦空間。

module.securitycraft.reinforced_hopper.w: 將白名單模組添加到強化漏斗中將允許白名單玩家訪問漏斗的內容，並從自己受密碼保護的箱子/熔爐/...使用此漏斗。

config.securitycraft:allowAdminTool: 是否允許使用管理工具？
config.securitycraft:shouldSpawnFire: 地雷爆炸時會引發火災？
config.securitycraft:shouldSpawnFire.too: 地雷爆炸後應該引發火災嗎？
config.securitycraft:ableToBreakMines.to: 玩家應該能夠打破地雷而不爆炸嗎？
config.securitycraft:ableToCraftLUKeycar: 可製作的有限使用鑰匙卡？
有限的使用鑰匙卡是否可製作？
config.securitycraft:smallerMineExplosio: 如果地雷的爆炸比平常小。
config.securitycraft:mineExplodesWhenInC: 地雷在創意中破碎時爆炸？
如果地雷在創意模式下被破壞，是否應該爆炸？
如果安裝了「LookingGlass」，會在啟動後5分鐘後關閉控制台以節省資源
config.securitycraft:useLookingGlass.too: 如果未安裝「LookingGlass」，安全工藝是否應使用「LookingGlass」來查看監視器？
config.securitycraft:laserBlockRange.too: 從多少個方塊之外，激光塊可以連接到另一個激光塊？
config.securitycraft:sayThanksMessage: 在生成時顯示「提示」訊息？
config.securitycraft:sayThanksMessage.to: 加入世界時，是否應該向玩家發送「提示」訊息？
config.securitycraft:debuggingMode: 除錯模式是否為除錯模式？（不建議！
config.securitycraft:debuggingMode.toolt: 安全工藝應該在調試模式下運行嗎？（將額外內容記錄到主控台，可能會添加可能為越野車的未完成項目/塊。
config.securitycraft:isIrcBotEnabled.too: 內置的互聯網中繼聊天機器人（在使用命令時使用'/sc connect'and'/sc contact'）是否啟用？
config.securitycraft:disconnectOnWorldCl: 斷開IRC機器人在世界退出？
如果您已使用命令'/sc connect'or'/sc contact',如果您離開您所在的世界，IRC機器人是否應該斷開連接？
config.securitycraft:useOldKeypadRecipe: 使用舊密碼鎖方塊配方（9個按鈕）？
應該啟用9個按鈕的過時密碼鎖方塊配方嗎？
config.securitycraft:cameraSpeed.tooltip: 連線到監視器並按住W-A-S-D時，旋轉速度有多快？
config.securitycraft:checkForUpdates.too: 安全程式是否應通過安全工藝的GitHub儲存庫檢查模組的新更新？
config.securitycraft:allowBlockClaim: 允許聲稱沒有擁有權的塊？
config.securitycraft:allowBlockClaim.too: 允許聲稱沒有擁有權的塊？
config.securitycraft:maxAlarmRange.toolt: 警示範圍選項的最大值是多大值？請注意，這可能受大塊載入距離的限制。更高的值也未必是微調的。
config.securitycraft:respect_invisibilit: 哨兵/安全檢測器/雷射塊/等是否應忽略不可見的玩家和實體？
config.securitycraft:reinforced_block_ti: 強化方塊的材質應該比原版塊稍微暗一點嗎？
config.securitycraft:ableToCraftMines.to: 所有的地雷（彈跳貝蒂/闊刀地雷/泥土地雷/石礦/...）都是可製作的嗎？
config.securitycraft:retinalScannerFace: 視網膜掃描器上顯示所有者的臉？
視網膜掃描器是否應該在塊上呈現其擁有者的臉？（如果您對Mojang的身份驗證伺服器有問題，則停用此伺服器）
option.securitycraft.portable_radar.enab: 雷達是否搜尋任何玩家
option.securitycraft.security_camera.rot: 監視器控制台旋轉的速度。
option.securitycraft.security_camera.sho: 監視器控制台應該旋轉嗎？
option.securitycraft.keypad.isAlwaysActi: 密碼鎖方塊是否保持解鎖狀態？
此密碼鎖方塊在啟動時（使用白名單/黑名單模組時）是否發送消息？

help.securitycraft.speed_module.info: The speed module allows some of SecurityCraft's blocks to operate faster than usual.
gui.securitycraft:scManual.patreon.title: Our Patrons:
gui.securitycraft:trophy_system.moduleRe: You need to install a Smart Module to toggle which projectile types can be targeted by this Trophy System.
gui.securitycraft:trophy_system.toggle: Click the entries in the list below to toggle the targeting of that specific projectile type.
gui.securitycraft:keycard_reader.noSmart: You need a Smart Module to control the keycard levels individually.
gui.securitycraft:keycard_reader.level_m: The level of this keycard is not enabled in this keycard reader!
messages.securitycraft:codebreaker.faile: Code breaking attempt failed, please try again.
messages.securitycraft:keycardReader.dif: The Keycard Reader that this card was linked to belongs to a different player than the one you are trying to use!
messages.securitycraft:keycardReader.wro: The signature saved on this card does not match the Keycard Reader's signature!
This Keycard Reader does not allow keycards of level %s!
messages.securitycraft:keycardReader.noU: This Keycard does not have any uses left!
messages.securitycraft:module.onAllowlis: You are added to the allowlist.
messages.securitycraft:module.onDenylist: You are added to the denylist.
messages.securitycraft:adminTool.disable: The Admin Tool has been disabled through the config file.
messages.securitycraft:blockpocket.assem: Assembling the Block Pocket has failed %1$s the Block Pocket Manager. (Incorrect Block: %2$s)
tooltip.securitycraft:projector: Projects fake blocks into the world.
tooltip.securitycraft:keycard.reader_own: Works on Keycard Readers owned by: %s
tooltip.securitycraft:keycard.link_info: Put this card into a Keycard Reader to link it.
tooltip.securitycraft:keycard.limited_in: Combine this card with a Limited Use Keycard in a crafting table to control how often it can be used.
module.securitycraft.ims.speed_module.de: Adding a speed module to an I.M.S. will make the I.M.S. shoot faster, as well as increase the speed of the shot bombs.
module.securitycraft.keycard_reader.smar: Adding a smart module to a keycard reader will allow for unrestricted control of the keycard levels accepted by the keycard reader.
module.securitycraft.protecto.speed_modu: Adding a speed module to a protecto will allow it to attack twice as fast.
module.securitycraft.keypad_chest.redsto: Adding a redstone module to a Password-protected Chest will make the chest output a redstone signal while being open, with a strength depending on how many players are simultaneously looking into the chest.
module.securitycraft.username_logger.whi: Adding an allowlist module to a Username Logger will prevent the listed players from being logged.
module.securitycraft.trophy_system.smart: Adding a smart module to a Trophy System will allow you to configure which projectile types the Trophy System is allowed to target.
module.securitycraft.trophy_system.speed: Adding a speed module to a Trophy System allows it to destroy targets twice as fast.
module.securitycraft.trophy_system.white: Adding an allowlist module to a Trophy System will make it ignore projectiles thrown by listed players, as well as their Sentries' bullets and I.M.S.' bombs.
module.securitycraft.cage_trap.whitelist: Adding an allowlist module to a Cage Trap will prevent listed players from being trapped.
module.securitycraft.reinforced_cauldron: Adding an allowlist module to a Reinforced Cauldron will allow listed players to interact with the Reinforced Cauldron.
option.securitycraft.reinforced_cauldron: Should every player be able to interact with this block?
The reinforced iron door is the same as the vanilla iron door, except it is unbreakable. It can only be opened by Keypads, Inventory Scanners, etc. The owner of the door can use the universal block remover to break it down.
help.securitycraft.scanner_door.info: The Scanner Door acts like a Retinal Scanner combined with a Reinforced Iron Door, where the owner looks at the top to open it.
help.securitycraft.keypad_door.info: The Keypad Door acts like a Keypad combined with a Reinforced Iron Door, where a code has to be inserted in order to open the door.
help.securitycraft.key_panel.info: The key panel can be placed down for a smaller, waterloggable version of the keypad. It is also used in the crafting recipes of keypads, password-protected chests, and password-protected furnaces.
help.securitycraft.sonic_security_system: The Sonic Security System, inspired by the similarly-named device in the game "Metroid Prime 2: Echoes", is able to lock certain SecurityCraft blocks and prevent them from being used or interacted with. Right-clicking a supported block will bind it to the Sonic Security System. Once it is placed down, right-clicking it will open a GUI where you can enable, disable, or reset the Sonic Security System. The blocks can be unlocked by playing a tune nearby, either via the Portable Tune Player, or note blocks. To set such a tune, toggle note recording on in the Sonic Security System's GUI then play the tune that you want using note blocks played nearby. Toggle the recording off once you are finished. Any time that tune is played nearby the Sonic Security System, blocks locked by it will become accessible for a short while.
The portable tune player can play a tune that was previously saved to it. To save a tune, rightclick a Sonic Security System that has already recorded a tune. To play the tune, rightclick the portable tune player. To cancel the playback, simply rightclick the portable tune player again or stop holding it.
gui.securitycraft:scManual.lockable: Lockable: This block can be locked with a Sonic Security System.
messages.securitycraft:cameraMonitor.cam: The camera at position %s is not available. It may either not be loaded, in a different dimension, or it no longer exists.
messages.securitycraft:universalOwnerCha: The block's owner has been changed and thus needs to be validated by the new owner to work again. To validate a block, the new owner of the block has to rightclick it.
messages.securitycraft:ownable.validate: The owner of this block has been successfully validated.
messages.securitycraft:ownable.ownerNotV: This block's owner has been changed by the Universal Owner Changer and thus needs to be validated by the new owner to work again. To validate a block, the new owner of the block has to rightclick it.
messages.securitycraft:sonic_security_sy: Not linked with a block yet. Please right-click a compatible SecurityCraft block with this item in your hand first.
You cannot link to additional blocks. Each Sonic Security System can be linked to a maximum of %s blocks.
This %s is being locked by a Sonic Security System!
module.securitycraft.security_camera.whi: Adding the allowlist module to a camera will allow listed players to access the camera.
module.securitycraft.protecto.disguise_m: Adding a disguise module to a protecto will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.keypad_furnace.disg: Adding a disguise module to a Password-protected Furnace will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.trophy_system.disgu: Adding a disguise module to a Trophy System will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.key_panel.whitelist: Adding an allowlist module to a key panel  will allow listed players to use the block without knowing the code.
module.securitycraft.key_panel.blacklist: Adding a denylist module to a key panel will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
module.securitycraft.sonic_security_syst: Adding an allowlist module to a sonic security system will allow listed players to save the system's tune onto a portable tune player, as well as listen to the tune in the system's GUI.
Adding a redstone module to a sonic security system lets the system emit a redstone signal when the correct tune was played.
option.securitycraft.key_panel.isAlwaysA: Should the key panel remain active and unlocked?
option.securitycraft.key_panel.sendMessa: Does this key panel send a message upon activation (when using allowlist/denylist modules)?
option.securitycraft.key_panel.signalLen: How long should the redstone signal upon successful activation be? (In ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second)
option.securitycraft.sonic_security_syst: How long should the sonic security system unlock blocks/give off a redstone signal after hearing the correct tune? (In ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second)
help.securitycraft.reinforced.info: Reinforced blocks are unbreakable building blocks with vanilla equivalents. Only the person who placed them down can destroy them using the universal block remover.
help.securitycraft.block_mines.info: Block mines are mines disguised as a different block. Walking into, or mining one of them, will cause it to explode. This is not the case for the owner of the block mine.
help.securitycraft.reinforced_buttons.in: The reinforced buttons can only be activated by their owner or players on the allowlist.
help.securitycraft.reinforced_pressure_p: The reinforced pressure plates can only be activated by their owner or players on the allowlist.
help.securitycraft.furnace_mines.info: Furnace mines function just like the standard mines, except they only explode when rightclicked or broken by someone other than the owner.
help.securitycraft.keycards.info: Keycards can be linked to Keycard Readers in order to open them. To reset the settings on keycard, put it into a crafting table. See the Keycard Reader's manual page for more information.
help.securitycraft.secret_signs.info: The Secret Sign works like a vanilla sign, with the slight difference that only the owner of the sign and players on the allowlist can interact with, and view the text on it. Make sure no one can break the block it's placed on!
help.securitycraft.block_reinforcers.inf: The Universal Block Reinforcer reinforces numerous vanilla blocks, and turns them into the SecurityCraft variants. To do this, right-click the Universal Block Reinforcer and put the vanilla block into the top slot, then close the GUI. Alternatively, break any block (while not in creative mode) to reinforce it. To convert a reinforced block back to its vanilla variant, use the bottom slot (only available for the level 2 reinforcer). The level 1 reinforcer has 300 uses, level 2 has 2700 uses, and level 3 has unlimited uses.
help.securitycraft.keypad_smoker.info: The password-protected smoker will require you to enter a passcode when you first place it down. After that, entering the correct code into the GUI will allow you to access the smoker's inventory.
The password-protected blast furnace will require you to enter a passcode when you first place it down. After that, entering the correct code into the GUI will allow you to access the blast furnace's inventory.
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.keypad: Place down a Smoker and rightclick it with a Key Panel.
Place down a Blast Furnace and rightclick it with a Key Panel.
module.securitycraft.keypad_smoker.white: Adding an allowlist module to a Password-protected Smoker will allow players to open it without knowing the code. Additionally, Reinforced Hoppers owned by listed players can extract items from the smoker.
module.securitycraft.keypad_smoker.black: Adding a denylist module to a Password-protected Smoker will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
module.securitycraft.keypad_smoker.disgu: Adding a disguise module to a Password-protected Smoker will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.keypad_blast_furnac: Adding an allowlist module to a Password-protected Blast Furnace will allow players to open it without knowing the code. Additionally, Reinforced Hoppers owned by listed players can extract items from the blast furnace.
Adding a denylist module to a Password-protected Blast Furnace will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
Adding a disguise module to a Password-protected Blast Furnace will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
option.securitycraft.keypad_smoker.sendM: Does this smoker send a message upon activation (when using allowlist/denylist modules)?
option.securitycraft.keypad_blast_furnac: Does this blast furnace send a message upon activation (when using allowlist/denylist modules)?
help.securitycraft.block_change_detector: The Block Change Detector detects players breaking and/or placing blocks in its vicinity (5 blocks by default, can be changed with the universal block modifier). Right-clicking the block will open its interface, where a list of detected changes can be seen, as well as whether it only detects breaking or placing blocks, or both.
gui.securitycraft:scManual.recipe.bucket: The Fake Lava Bucket is created in the brewing stand, by putting any healing potion into the top slot, and up to three lava buckets in the bottom slots.
The Fake Water Bucket is created in the brewing stand, by putting any harming potion into the top slot, and up to three water buckets in the bottom slots.
Install a Smart Module to allow the detector to only detect a specific block type!
module.securitycraft.block_change_detect: Adding a disguise module to a block change detector will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.

Adding an allowlist module to a block change detector will allow listed players to place/break blocks in the block's vicinity, without getting logged. They will also be able to view all logged entries, however they cannot clear them, or change the block's settings.
Adding a redstone module to a block change detector makes it emit a redstone signal each time it detects a block was changed by a player in its vicinity.
Adding a smart module to a block change detector allows it to only log changes of one specific type of block. The block can be set in the GUI.
option.securitycraft.block_change_detect: How long should the redstone signal after detecting a block change be? (In ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second)
How far away should the detector be able to detect block changes by players?
option.generic.disabled.description: Should this block be disabled, making it no longer work until it is enabled again?
help.securitycraft.rift_stabilizer.info: The Rift Stabilizer detects and prevents teleportation attempts by entities in its vicinity (5 blocks by default, can be changed with the universal block modifier). Teleportation attempts will be prohibited if the source or target position of the teleport is within the block's range. Rightclicking the block will allow you to see a list of all detectable teleportation types.
help.securitycraft.display_case.info: The Display Case can display one item, similar to a vanilla item frame, although the item cannot be rotated. Opening the case requires inserting a passcode, just like the Keypad and other similar blocks do. Once open, an item can be inserted by rightclicking the case with the item. To retrieve the item, sneak-rightclick the case. To close the case, rightclick it with an empty hand. While the case is open, anyone can interact with it.
Highlight listed blocks in the world
gui.securitycraft:rift_stabilizer.module: You need to install a Smart Module to toggle which teleportation types can be detected by this Rift Stabilizer.
gui.securitycraft:rift_stabilizer.toggle: Click the entries in the list below to toggle the detection of that specific teleportation type.
messages.securitycraft:rift_stabilizer.n: You are not permitted to teleport to that position!
You are not permitted to teleport from this position!
module.securitycraft.laser_block.redston: Adding a redstone module to a laser block will cause it to emit a 15-block redstone signal when a mob or player walks through the laser.
module.securitycraft.rift_stabilizer.dis: Adding a disguise module to a Rift Stabilizer will cause the texture & model of it to change to the texture & model of the block that is added to the disguise module.
module.securitycraft.rift_stabilizer.whi: Adding an allowlist module to a Rift Stabilizer will allow listed players to teleport into or from the block's vicinity.
module.securitycraft.rift_stabilizer.red: Adding a redstone module to a Rift Stabilizer makes it emit a redstone signal each time it detects a teleportation attempt in its vicinity. This redstone signal will be stronger if the detection happened near the block, and weaker if it happened further away. Additionally, it will allow a comparator to be used to determine the last detected teleportation type.
module.securitycraft.rift_stabilizer.har: Adding a harming module to a Rift Stabilizer will cause players attempting to teleport into or from its vicinity to take damage.
module.securitycraft.rift_stabilizer.sma: Adding a smart module to a Rift Stabilizer will allow you to configure which teleportation types the Rift Stabilizer is able to detect.
module.securitycraft.display_case.whitel: Adding an allowlist module to a display case will allow listed players to open it without knowing the code.
module.securitycraft.display_case.blackl: Adding a denylist module to a display case will ban listed players from interacting with the block.
option.securitycraft.rift_stabilizer.sig: How long should the redstone signal after detecting a teleportation attempt be? (In ticks, 20 ticks = 1 second)
option.securitycraft.rift_stabilizer.ran: How far away should the Rift Stabilizer be able to prevent teleportation attempts?
option.securitycraft.display_case.sendMe: Does this case send a message upon activation (when using allowlist/denylist modules)?
